entry.text:
[B6A67B]For the period of subscription you will get:[-]
- Triple in-game shop point income. - Special stand out shade of green name color in-game. - Special Discord role and access to the supporter only channels. - Ability to set second and third home location (/sethome2, /sethome3 and /home2,/home3). - Access to a /bag chat command that will take you back to your death location. - Access to /donor Safe Zone with 5 traders and 2 workbenches. - You are allowed to have 21 land claims placed per map. - Permanent player buffs
[B6A67B]Player Buffs - [-][39ff14]Tier 4[-]
- 10% XP Gain increase - 5% Walk/Run speed increase - 10% Stamina regen increase - 10% Noise reduction - 20% Faster looting - 5% loot bonus
